'''Charles de Lint''' (born [[22 December|December 22]], [[1951]]) is a Canadian author who primarily writes fantasy fiction.

In 1986, de Lint was Guest of Honour at [[Mythcon 17]].

==Bibliography, selected==

===Articles and short stories===
*[[1991]]: ''[[After the King|After the King: Stories In Honor of J.R.R. Tolkien]]''
**"Conjure Man"
*[[2001]]: ''[[Meditations on Middle-earth]]''
**"The Tale Goes Ever On"
